name: Ciroth Muller Weidema Lesage
description:
Data quality system with uncertainties included. A modification of the original ecoinvent pedigree factors, based on an empirical investigation of uncertainty factors. Uncertainty factors described as "not available" in the original source are set to 25 here, as a prohibitive value.

Empirically based uncertainty factors for the pedigree matrix in ecoinvent.
Ciroth, A., Muller, S., Weidema, B. et al. Int J Life Cycle Assess 21, 1338â€“1348 (2016).
